metadata.name: Indirect Command Execution By Program Compatibility Wizard
metadata.comment: Detect indirect command execution via Program Compatibility Assistant pcwrun.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\pcwrun.exe')))

output.summary: Detect indirect command execution via Program Compatibility Assistant pcwrun.exe

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ComputerName, actor.user.name, process.parent_process.cmd_line, process.cmd_line False positives: 1. Need to use extra processing with 'unique_count' / 'filter' to focus on outliers as opposed to commonly seen artifacts 2. Legit usage of scripts References: https://twitter.com/pabraeken/status/991335019833708544, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Pcwrun/
